mapper.select: SELECT b.cust_id as cust_id, b.center_id as center_id, b.consultant_id as consultant_id, b.status AS "status", b.create_time AS "createDate", b.create_id AS "createBy.id", b.update_id AS "updateBy.id", b.update_time AS "updateDate" FROM biz_custom_center_consultant b WHERE b.cust_id = #{id} and status = 1 limit 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_custom_center_consultant ( cust_id, center_id, consultant_id, create_time, create_id, update_id ) VALUES ( #{custId}, #{centerId}, #{consultantId}, now(), #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_custom_center_consultant SET center_id = #{centerId}, consultant_id = #{consultantId}, update_time = #{updateDate}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, status = #{status} WHERE cust_id = #{custId}
